actionAppleScript.inline: tell application "Safari"do JavaScript "javascript:document.querySelector('.ytd-compact-video-renderer img').click();" in document 1end tell

tell application "Safari"do JavaScript "javascript:var video = document.querySelector('video'); video.webkitSetPresentationMode(video.webkitPresentationMode === 'picture-in-picture' ? 'inline' : 'picture-in-picture');" in document 1end tell
tell application "Safari"do JavaScript "javascript:document.querySelector('.ytp-ad-skip-button-text').click();" in document 1end tell
